gw.api.contact

Class ABContactPluginBeanUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.contact.ABContactPluginBeanUtil

  • public class ABContactPluginBeanUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some methods to for use by the ABContactPlugin. These methods are exposed here to indicate their usage is for the plugin code only.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ABContactPluginBeanUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Bundle getBundleForContactCreation()
      Returns the current transaction bundle or a new Bundle instance if no ThreadLocalBundleProvider exists.
      static boolean isBeanNonPersistent(KeyableBean bean)
      Return if the bean is non persistent, i.e. has been marked non persistent or is in a bundle which precludes the bean from being persisted to the database
      static void markAsUpdatedInAddressBook(Contact contact)
      Mark the contact as having being updated in AddressBook.
      static void markBeanNonPersistent(KeyableBean bean)
      Mark the bean as being non persistent, i.e. it will not be persisted to the database when it's bundle is committed.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ABContactPluginBeanUtil

        public ABContactPluginBeanUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • isBeanNonPersistent

        public static boolean isBeanNonPersistent(KeyableBean bean)
        Return if the bean is non persistent, i.e. has been marked non persistent or is in a bundle which precludes the bean from being persisted to the database
        Parameters:
        bean - the bean to check
        Returns:
        boolean indicating the bean's non persistent state

      • markBeanNonPersistent

        public static void markBeanNonPersistent(KeyableBean bean)
        Mark the bean as being non persistent, i.e. it will not be persisted to the database when it's bundle is committed.
        Parameters:
        bean - the bean to mark as non persistent

      • markAsUpdatedInAddressBook

        public static void markAsUpdatedInAddressBook(Contact contact)
        Mark the contact as having being updated in AddressBook. This is used to notify the contact that is was updated in AddressBook via the ContactMessageTransport as opposed to via the UI.
        Parameters:
        contact - the contact updated

      • getBundleForContactCreation

        public static Bundle getBundleForContactCreation()
        Returns the current transaction bundle or a new Bundle instance if no ThreadLocalBundleProvider exists. Used to obtain the bundle to create new Contacts in, if no bundle has been provided.
        Returns:
        Bundle - the current transaction bundle or a new Bundle instance
